title: Arsenal 1-0 Chelsea: What Were The Main Talking Points As The Gunners Claim London Bragging Rights?
description: Claiming London bragging rights on Sunday afternoon, Mikel Merino’s first-half header was enough to drag Arsenal to a 1-0 victory against Chelsea. Doing all of the early pressing and almost carving the Blues apart, Mikel Arteta’s side took a deserved lead after 20 minutes as Merino glanced on a curling corner from Martin Odegaard past […] The post Arsenal 1-0 Chelsea: What Were The Main Talking Points As The Gunners Claim London Bragging Rights? appeared first on Soccer News.
author: Tom Dunstan

title: Atletico Madrid 2-4 Barcelona: Torres nets brace in second-half comeback
description: Ferran Torres scored twice to help Barcelona come from two goals behind to beat Atletico Madrid 4-2 and move Hansi Flick’s side back to the top of the LaLiga table. Barcelona are now level on points with Real Madrid, but have a game in hand over their rivals following last week’s postponement of their league […] The post Atletico Madrid 2-4 Barcelona: Torres nets brace in second-half comeback appeared first on Soccer News.
author: SoccerNews
